item.title: SpaceX’s Starlink could have some advantages over Verizon in bid for FAA contract takeover, experts say. It could also trigger a slew of conflict-of-interest lawsuits from competitors
item.description: The FAA is reportedly considering ending a $2.4 billion contract with Verizon to update its communication technology and instead award it to Elon Musk...

item.title: Super Micro insiders dump millions worth of stock after getting the all-clear sign from Nasdaq on its financial filings
item.description: The server manufacturer was delinquent on its annual financial and quarterly reports but met a Feb. 25 deadline set by Nasdaq to regain compliance.

item.title: Six years ago 23andMe was worth $6 billion. Now CEO Anne Wojcicki is trying to buy it back for $75 million
item.description: Experts say the CEO’s second attempt to buy back the troubled DNA startup comes with a slew of corporate governance red flags.

item.title: Unilever’s woes in Indonesia carry a warning for its new CEO
item.description: Unilever’s local rivals’ “game is simple: just cut the price,” said Willy Goutama, an equity analyst at PT Maybank Sekuritas Indonesia.

item.title: If you’re not happy with your Medicare Advantage plan, experts offer these tips to find better benefits
item.description: People in Medicare Advantage plans are now in the middle of the Open Enrollment period allowing them to either change plans or switch to Original Medi...
